response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I propose a price of $12,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity cost for both of us. Should you decide to proceed, I promise a seamless transaction and support throughout the process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12500}
